Main page> Exhibitor manual 2022
Exhibitor manual 2022
Dear Exhibitors!
Here you can find the Exhibitor Manual which contains important information necessary for your exhibition to be successful and efficient.Please note that some order forms must be filled in and returned to the Organizer not later than the date specified therein. For this purpose, please read the Manual’s contents carefully and make the required order on time.
Exhibitor Manual
Download Catalogue
The Exhibitor Manual deals with technical information of the forthcoming exhibition,
equipment delivery and handling procedure, rules for tasting products exhibited at
stands and other useful information which you may need while preparing for the
exhibition
In case you need technical services, please fill the form for ordering equipment and
services. You may get the forms from your sales or technical manager.
Some order forms must be filled in and returned to the Organizer on a mandatory
basis not later than the date specified therein.
CONTACTS
